display.title: Large Gas Turbine
description: The &&3Large Gas Turbine&&r may not leave a huge impression in &&5EV&&r, but it has the ability to scale to &&9better production&&r than the base 4096 EU/t, and boasts &&9greater efficiency&&r.
Each Large Turbine will require a &&aTurbine Rotor&&r and a &&3Rotor Holder&&r. More on the Turbine mechanics in the &&lnext&&r Quest.
&&9Note:&&r This Quest &&eonly&&r requires the Controller, but you still need all the multiblock parts to construct the Turbine.
Turbines &&cvoid&&r energy if they're unable to output. If you plan on using this with HV power, use a Rotor with close to 100% Power stat.
